ComicInfo.Summary:
Warashi: A man masturbates while his partner sleeps, and receives a vision.
Live and Let Dine: A woman wants to eat her man.
The Bride of Dinoboy: Dinoboy's married life.
The Tapeworm: Susana has a tapeworm.
Portrait of an American Princess: A couple with unusual habits.
Brainfood: 8-Ball is on the rampage.
This Modern World: Sex in the future.
Hospital Hell!!: Joe is sent to an unconventional hospital.
